docs.snippet: German automaker Volkswagen AG said Tuesday that it was in "advanced talks" with United States authorities over a proposed settlement in its diesel emissions scandal under which the company would pay $4.3 billion in criminal and civil fines....
docs.lead_paragraph: German automaker Volkswagen AG said Tuesday that it was in "advanced talks" with United States authorities over a proposed settlement in its diesel emissions scandal under which the company would pay $4.3 billion in criminal and civil fines.

headline.main: Volkswagen: Draft Deal in Scandal Contains $4.3B in Fines
headline.print_headline: Volkswagen: Draft Deal in Scandal Contains $4.3B in Fines

docs.snippet: The Knights of Malta, the ancient Catholic lay order, is refusing to cooperate with a Vatican investigation into the sacking of a top official over a condom scandal — and is warning its members to toe the line if they choose to speak with in...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Knights of Malta, the ancient Catholic lay order, is refusing to cooperate with a Vatican investigation into the sacking of a top official over a condom scandal — and is warning its members to toe the line if they choose to speak with investigators.

headline.main: Knights of Malta Refuse to Assist 'Irrelevant' Papal Probe
headline.print_headline: Knights of Malta Refuse to Assist 'Irrelevant' Papal Probe

docs.snippet: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo is proposing to complete and connect two greenway trails crisscrossing the state from Manhattan to Canada and from Albany to Buffalo to create a 750-mile paved biking and hiking route that will be marketed as a national ...
docs.lead_paragraph: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo is proposing to complete and connect two greenway trails crisscrossing the state from Manhattan to Canada and from Albany to Buffalo to create a 750-mile paved biking and hiking route that will be marketed as a national tourist destination.

headline.main: Cuomo Pitches 750-Mile Biking-Hiking Trail Plan for NY State
